Icon.Name: ID53855
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:53855 203.68,53.83,1259.59 Level 108 Epic(x4) ^^^ A statue in middle of nowhere. Occasionally a group of Dracurion stoneweavers will spawn around it and after a while animate it, and then it will very slowly walk towards Ganak's Battlement. Along the road to the Battlement are 21 ballistas that must be repaired by crafting and then fired at the statue to knock it down, then it can be damaged for 60 seconds. Each ballista can only be fired once. If it actually reaches Ganak's Battlement you will still have a small window of time to damage it.

Icon.Name: ID65367
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65367 661.62,-132.14,-587.57 Level 103-104^ Di'Zok ghost. - Needs to be hunted for clues for the quest 'Case of the Missing Headpiece' and for sarnak spirit shards for the KA SQ 'Kunark Ascending: A Nightmare Realized'. - Once the first Obulus remnant not needed for another quest is defeated it starts the timed key quest 'A Goblin Nightmare' for which you'll have 20 minutes to do the following: 1. Banish 30 Kly lookouts (level 106^ Di'Zok ghosts). 2. Stop 5 Kly abductors (level 106^ Di'Zok ghosts) from reaching the Crypt of Dalnir with their goblin captives. 3. Escort the 5 frightened Bloody Tooth goblins that the Kly abductors dropped to the staircase leading into Twark, which turns them into rescued Bloody Tooth goblins. 4. Defeat a Kly overseer (level 106^ Di'Zok ghost) inside the Crypt of Dalnir Building, not the zone. - Spawns only during the norrathian night (8pm-6am).

Icon.Name: ID69086
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69086 108.00,-242.61,-918.64 - After you removed the Chaos Stone from the Zou Crystalline Lanys T'Vyl wants to steal it from you, this is however foiled by Queen Alwanielle teleporting you to this beach with the Chaos Stone in hand. - Sadly before you can regain full conciousness you are scooped up by a group of Crusaders of Greenmist, who put you in chains and bring you back to the Crusaders' Cave.

Icon.Name: ID69087
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69087 733.44,248.99,1334.61 - After you removed the Chaos Stone from the Zou Crystalline Lanys T'Vyl wants to steal it from you, this is however foiled by Queen Alwanielle teleporting you onto a beach north of Twark with the Chaos Stone in hand. - Sadly before you can regain full conciousness you are scooped up by a group of Crusaders of Greenmist, who put you in chains and bring you back here. - While you could call home to get out of the chains the intended way of bargaining with Trooper Sotek is much more fun.

Icon.Name: ID65254
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65254 -544.80,89.11,-538.53 When these 2 mobs die, the named in center of the room awakens and begins walking along the spiral, toward the next room. Failure condition if they manage to leave. Adds make the mob immune to damage or heal it. Ditto for the next named. Put the merc on the named and pull the adds away from it.

Icon.Name: ID65255
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65255 -510.78,88.98,-543.43 Mobs must be activated by getting within melee range, but they remain rooted and undamageable. Then you must clear the room of spectral lords and acolytes. One of them will un-root and attack you first, when it is down, clear the room again, the other will un-root. Each debuffs you when they un-root, and if you want, you can release it by clearing spectral lords or acolytes depending on which debuff you have.

Icon.Name: ID65256
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65256 -406.13,100.68,-617.94 Mobs must be activated by getting within melee range, but they remain rooted and undamageable. Then you must clear the room of spectral lords and acolytes. One of them will un-root and attack you first, when it is down, clear the room again, the other will un-root. Each debuffs you when they un-root, and if you want, you can release it by clearing spectral lords or acolytes depending on which debuff you have.

In the process he'll spawn a pulsing yellow AE that instakills anyone that walks into it (DP's don't work). Keep the group moving away from him when he yellow texts until you see the yellow pulse drop

Icon.Name: ID71918
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:71918 19.53,4.08,-171.85 105 Heroic ^^^. Roams the area, must Keep it below 10% power, otherwise expect the entire group to be instakilled, especially if you have pets. Puts a curse on you. If not cured, group wipe. Otherwise tank'n'spank.

Icon.Name: ID71919
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:71919 60.73,16.37,-281.10 106 Heroic ^^^. Will yellow text every 30 seconds which requires a 20m joust, otherwise anyone near him gets hit for large amounts of damage. I just moved back and forth at the top of the platform where he is, as dragging him down the stairs resulted in a leash and encounter reset.

Icon.Name: ID65158
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65158 -176.42,31.59,31.67 - Can be destroyed upon defeating Tootooz the Cryptomaniac. - Destroying this wall starts the timed quest 'Spiders Nest'. This requires you to clear the 4 waves of the ring event in the crypt behind the wall in 4 minutes.

Icon.Name: ID65159
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65159 -145.21,26.50,59.82 Level 100v-100 spider. - Grouped with 1-2 level 100v crypt stalker.

Icon.Name: ID65160
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65160 -176.23,26.52,52.65 Level 100v spider. - Spawns in the coffin as the 4th and final wave of the ring event for the timed quest 'Spider's Nest'.

Icon.Name: ID65161
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65161 -176.36,28.91,66.96 Group of 4-8 level 100v spiders. - Part of ring event for the quest 'Spider's Nest' that needs to be finished in 4 minutes. - 1st wave: 4 groups of 4 level 100vv crypt stalkers. - 2nd wave: 2 groups of 6 level 100vv crypt stalkers. - 3rd wave: a group of 8 level 100vv crypt stalkers.

Icon.Name: ID65162
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65162 -229.32,1.23,-189.93 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID65164
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65164 32.00,1.23,-238.00 Level 100v skeleton. - Once the first crypt walker is defeated it starts the timed quest 'Put to Rest' requiring to defeat 19 more in 10? minutes. - In order to do this timed quest, you must jump and climb the crypt walls so that you can activate more crypt walkers when you get close enough. - Once the restless noble in this room has been defeated all needed risen crypt walkers for the timed quest 'Spider's Nest' can be accessed.

Icon.Name: ID65165

Icon.Name: ID65168
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65168 -418.83,1.23,-194.02 Attach your [a junction box lever] here, then pull the lever down to open the nearby grate to the tube leading to the Frenzied Feeder.

Icon.Name: ID65175
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65175 -661.61,11.02,-319.97 Level 101 devourer. - Drops [a teleportation rune] needed to activate the rune base to enter the norther part of the zone. - Circles the room clockwise. - When the other devourers smell its blood they'll add to the fight. - Spawns groups of 3 ravenous feeders (Level 101v devourers).

Icon.Name: ID65176
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65176 -229.37,26.95,-374.61 Trying to push open the fifth locked door will cause the Enchanted Sword and Enchanted Shield to become alive from this statue.

Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65178 -227.86,32.06,-374.21 Level 101 shield. - Grouped with the level 101 Enchanted Sword <Forge Guardian>. - Drops [a disenchanted shield] needed to open the magically sealed doors. - The shield has a permanent taunt if both are close together.

Icon.Name: ID65179
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65179 -233.44,32.53,-371.69 Level 101 sword. - Grouped with the level 101 Enchanted Shield <Forge Guardian>. - Drops [a disenchanted sword] needed to open the magically sealed doors. - Has a knockback.

Icon.Name: ID65180
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65180 -229.43,27.10,-424.60 - Trying to push open this door will cause the Enchanted Sword and Enchanted Shield to become alive from the armed Di'Zok statue. - Can be opened after the disenchanted sword and shield have been placed on their stands.

Icon.Name: ID65207
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65207 -114.00,-4.02,-170.00 Level 101 elemental. - Spawns by closing any open valve on the pipe next to that valve. - Drops [Slimeskin] which allows the caster when used to temporarily survive the toxic slime. - Spawns a lot of adds, which might require you to kite him around the room.

Icon.Name: ID65208
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65208 -307.18,-10.02,-130.19 - Possible location to pick up the [key to the collapsed tunnel] needed to unlock the fourth locked door. - The key is inside the toxic slime pool and can be found from the platform by looking for a red glow. In order to survive the toxicity of the pool its needed to use your [Slimeskin].

Icon.Name: ID65209
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65209 38.11,1.22,-238.61 Level 100 skeleton. - Once you defeat him, a group of 3 risen crypt walkers will raise in this room. - Once this restless noble becomes accessible all needed risen crypt walkers for the timed quest 'Spider's Nest' can be accessed.

Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65218 40.00,8.38,-164.00 Level 100v skeleton. - Once the first crypt walker is defeated it starts the timed quest 'Put to Rest' requiring to defeat 19 more in 10? minutes. - In order to do this timed quest, you must jump and climb the crypt walls so that you can activate more crypt walkers when you get close enough. - Since there are only ~18 available before the next door is opened its strongly ADVISED to leave them be until you have aquired your [key to the collapsed tunnel] from the toxic slime.

Icon.Name: ID68886
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68886 -455.59,-10.90,-189.46 - Opens when you use your [a junction box lever] attached to the junction box. - Remember to use your [Slimeskin] before jumping into the toxic slime. - Waterbreathing does not work in slime, so you'll have to swim fast.

Icon.Name: ID68887
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68887 -152.22,1.23,-190.08 - Running over one of these buff circles will give you a speed buff. - Spawns upon defeating The Googantuan.

Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68889 -198.45,27.12,-328.15 Can be opened after the disenchanted sword and shield have been placed on their stands.

Icon.PoiDescription: ID:71617 -121.37,-38.50,-403.81 Kill a rune keeper in the nearby tunnel then click the rune foundation to start the timed mission "Rune Run".

Icon.Name: ID71618
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:71618 0.91,1.34,-249.40 Wanders up and down the tunnel

Icon.PoiDescription: ID:71619 -91.64,-38.34,-267.57 Timed mission "Rune Run". Kill the rune keeper in the same rune then click the rune foundation to activate.

Icon.Name: ID71622
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:71622 103.65,-38.95,-267.40 Kill to get rune to activate the rune foundation in the room for the timed mission "Rune Run".

Icon.Name: ID71623
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:71623 122.84,-38.48,-400.87 Timed mission "Rune Run". Kill Izzak Sira, then click the rune foundation to activate.

Icon.Name: ID71625
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:71625 273.21,-38.73,-270.57 Wanders the halls in this area. Drops a rune for the timed mission "Rune Run".

Icon.Name: ID71626
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:71626 287.44,-33.63,-316.39 Timed mission "Rest in Pieces". Break wall, enter and kill three released nobles, then close the coffin lid.

Icon.PoiDescription: ID:71630 -0.01,-33.06,-475.23 Note the rune colors from left to right. Use this color order when activating runes in The Triad.

Icon.Name: ID71643
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:71643 -112.97,-174.78,-334.13 During the Kly fight, the color of the power sources guides which buttons to be pressed in the upstairs chamber.

Icon.Name: ID71644
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:71644 112.38,-174.89,-332.16 During the Kly fight, the color of the power sources guides which buttons to be pressed in the upstairs chamber.

Icon.Name: ID71646
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:71646 45.00,-170.00,-443.00 Plunderable house item

Icon.Name: ID65349
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65349 182.60,-36.42,-432.64 - Once you enter one of the 4 alcoves that serve as iksar tombs you'll start the timed quest 'Rest in Pieces'. - For this you have 4 minutes to entomb all 4 iksar by defeating their 3 forms and closing their coffin in each alcove. - It is ADVISED to destroy the 4 cracked walls to and pull the group of spiders in each alcove out, before starting this quest.

Icon.Name: ID65350
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65350 -0.02,-38.72,-239.06 Level 101 horror. - Unlocks the second locked door upon defeat. - The pit underneath it is bottomless. - You must be within 10m of it to damage it.

Icon.Name: ID65351
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65351 -4.26,-38.72,-299.12 Level 100 gooified goblin. - Grouped with a level 100v gooblin. - Two gooblins guard each of the 6 doors around the church and it is recommended to clear them before engaging Rector Droz'Kzar.

Icon.Name: ID65352
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65352 -96.14,-35.13,-401.26 Level 100 Di'Zok ghost. - Upon defeat the eastern rune foundation is able to be activated. - Paths from here through the tunnel to the south to a room above the southern entrance and back.

Icon.Name: ID65355
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65355 -0.30,-33.24,-462.07 Level 101 Di'Zok. - Unlocks the lower 4 magically sealed doors around the church upon defeat. - He is rooted to his altar, which also protects him from any damage. - Defeating a group of Kly believers causes him to leave his altar and become attackable. - Before returning to his altar he leave [Droz'kar's totem] behind that will explode with damage, knockback and a stun, so make sure to joust away quickly.

Icon.Name: ID65357
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65357 -123.21,-38.72,-404.05 - Upon defeating the rune keeper this eastern rune can be activated to start the timed quest 'Rune Run'. - For this you have 8 minutes to do the following: - Activate the southeastern and southwestern runes, noting down the color of each activated rune. - Activating those 3 runes will summon the curator and keeper of the western rune Izzak Sira in the Curator's Guard. - Once Izzak becomes immune to damage, move to the foundation whose rune matches the color of the speed-buff pads that spawn. - Those pads also protect from the damage received when leaving them. - Near the correct rune Izzaks power will temporarily wane allowing him to be damaged, until he spawns a new set of speed-buff pads to follow. - Upon defeating Izzak activate the western rune to stop the timer and complete the quest. - It is ADVISED to clear out all 3 rune keepers and other DiZok ghosts as well as the exhumed iksar skeletons in the Curator's Guard before starting the timer at this rune foundation here.

Icon.Name: ID65359
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65359 124.73,-38.72,-400.77 - Needed for the timed quest 'Rune Run'. - Upon defeating Izzak Sira activate the rune on this rune foundation to stop the timer and complete the quest. - It is ADVISED to clear out all 3 rune keepers and other DiZok ghosts as well as the exhumed iksar skeletons in the Curator's Guard before starting the timer at the eastern rune foundation.

Icon.Name: ID65360
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65360 324.63,-33.15,-265.91 Level 101 Di'Zok ghost. - Drops the [Rune of Awakening] needed to restore the minds of the confused goblins for 'Dying to Have You'. - Upon his defeat the upper magically sealed door in the church is opened. - Spawns upon activating the first 3 runes (east, southeast and southwest) during the timed quest 'Rune Run'. - Paths east-west in the southern part of the Curator's Guard. - When he becomes immune to damage, run to the rune foundation whose rune color matches the color of the speed-buff pads on the floor.

Icon.Name: ID65361
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65361 18.14,-27.70,-484.40 - The color of the rune activated from the eastern rune foundation is displayed here. - Note the color order of all 4 runes to solve the rune puzzle in the Triad.

Icon.Name: ID65362
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65362 -0.04,-13.99,-598.88 Upon defeating the Amalgams of the Triad this last rune can be activated to open the nearby southern locked gate to access the Ritual Chamber.

Icon.Name: ID65363
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65363 -0.01,-13.99,-772.50 Level 101v golem. - The order on which of the 3 Amalgams (* = Arcane, Polar or Toxic) is in which room is random. - Becomes attackable upon activating all 3 Trial Access Runes in the correct ordrer. - Calls the other 2 Amalgams at 70% health for help. - Defeat the one you can defeat fastest first to avoid copying with the damage of all 3. This depends on class, but generally the one which corresponds to your damage type (i.e. polar for a wizard with elemental spells) is the slowest to defeat and should be done last.

Icon.Name: ID65366
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65366 -0.03,28.40,-52.19 Rotate this middle statue to be granted passage through the first locked door to the north.

Icon.Name: ID68885
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68885 53.07,-24.00,-363.66 Level 100 Di'Zok ghost. - Example for any of the 9 Kly acolyte, Kly follower, Kly imprecator and Kly invoker Di'Zok ghosts floating through the church. - It is recommended to clear them all out before engaging Rector Droz'Kzar.

Icon.Name: ID68960
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68960 7.98,26.50,-4.51 Takes you back to "Obulus Frontier".
Icon.Tooltip: Climb out of The Crypt of Dalnir

Icon.Name: ID68961
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68961 -7.45,26.49,-27.26 While searching the foyer for clues, get near this dead goblin, then investigate the corpse to check wether it is Ghawg for 'Dying to Have You'.

Icon.Name: ID68962
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68962 -0.05,26.66,-73.24 Rotate the middle statue of the Haggle Baron's Warden to be granted passage.

Icon.Name: ID68963
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68963 0.00,26.77,-112.62 Connects to the northern orange teleportation pad to take you down to the Pit of Sacrifices.

Icon.Name: ID68964
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68964 0.00,-38.55,-152.96 Connects to the southern orange teleportation pad to take you back up to the Entrance.

Icon.Name: ID68965
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68965 0.00,-38.72,-212.90 Discovery location. - Once you get this far into the Pits Chamber The Sacrificed will spawn.

Icon.Name: ID68966
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68966 0.00,-38.19,-247.75 Try to avoid falling in.

Icon.Name: ID68967
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68967 0.00,-38.72,-387.97 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID68977
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68977 -0.04,-38.55,-285.12 Unlocks upon defeating The Sacrificed.

Icon.Name: ID68978
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68978 21.63,-38.72,-390.63 Group of 4 level 101vv Di'Zok. - Defeating a group causes Rector Droz'Kzar to leave his altar and become attackable. - Before returning to his altar the Rector will leave [Droz'kar's totem] behind that will explode with damage, knockback and a stun, so make sure to joust away quickly. - The groups respawn during the fight, but despawn upon defeating the Rector.

Icon.Name: ID68980
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68980 -33.46,-38.58,-437.54 - While exploring the crypt further after witnessing the sacrifice you find the 2 confused goblins Chorch and Ollash for 'Dying to Have You'. - After acquiring your [Rune of Awakening] cast it on one of the 2 goblins to restore their minds, then speak with Chorch again for 'Dying to Have You'. - To further your search for Ghawg he offers the quest 'Ghost and Gooblins'.

Icon.Name: ID68981
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68981 23.19,-38.72,-350.75 Group of 4 level 101vv Di'Zok. - Defeating a group causes Rector Droz'Kzar to leave his altar and become attackable. - Before returning to his altar the Rector will leave [Droz'kar's totem] behind that will explode with damage, knockback and a stun, so make sure to joust away quickly. - The groups respawn during the fight, but despawn upon defeating the Rector.

Icon.Name: ID68982
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68982 -17.82,-38.72,-350.54 Group of 4 level 101vv Di'Zok. - Defeating a group causes Rector Droz'Kzar to leave his altar and become attackable. - Before returning to his altar the Rector will leave [Droz'kar's totem] behind that will explode with damage, knockback and a stun, so make sure to joust away quickly. - The groups respawn during the fight, but despawn upon defeating the Rector.

Icon.Name: ID68983
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68983 -19.53,-38.72,-399.31 Group of 4 level 101vv Di'Zok. - Defeating a group causes Rector Droz'Kzar to leave his altar and become attackable. - Before returning to his altar the Rector will leave [Droz'kar's totem] behind that will explode with damage, knockback and a stun, so make sure to joust away quickly. - The groups respawn during the fight, but despawn upon defeating the Rector.

Icon.Name: ID68984
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68984 -0.06,-34.20,-438.88 While searching for Ghawg you're witnessing a goblin being sacrificed to the Kly when getting near this altar for 'Dying to Have You'.

Icon.Name: ID68985
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68985 -75.63,-38.56,-400.56 Unlocks upon defeating Rector Droz'Kzar.

Icon.Name: ID68986
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68986 75.48,-38.55,-400.65 Unlocks upon defeating Rector Droz'Kzar.

Icon.Name: ID68987
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68987 57.63,-38.78,-301.68 Unlocks upon defeating Rector Droz'Kzar.

Icon.Name: ID68988
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68988 -57.59,-38.78,-301.75 Unlocks upon defeating Rector Droz'Kzar.

Icon.Name: ID68989
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68989 99.51,-38.95,-256.93 Level 100 Di'Zok ghost. - Upon defeat the southwestern rune foundation is able to be activated. - Roams around the rune foundation.

Icon.Name: ID68990
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68990 -94.31,-38.95,-271.77 Level 100 Di'Zok ghost. - Upon defeat the southeastern rune foundation is able to be activated. - Roams around the rune foundation.

Icon.Name: ID68991
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68991 -92.63,-38.95,-266.33 - Upon defeating the rune keeper this southeastern rune can be activated to start the timed quest 'Rune Run'. - For this you have 8 minutes to do the following: - Activate the eastern and southwestern runes, noting down the color of each activated rune. - Activating those 3 runes will summon the curator and keeper of the western rune Izzak Sira in the Curator's Guard. - Once Izzak becomes immune to damage, move to the foundation whose rune matches the color of the speed-buff pads that spawn. - Those pads also protect from the damage received when leaving them. - Near the correct rune Izzaks power will temporarily wane allowing him to be damaged, until he spawns a new set of speed-buff pads to follow. - Upon defeating Izzak activate the western rune to stop the timer and complete the quest. - It is ADVISED to clear out all 3 rune keepers and other DiZok ghosts as well as the exhumed iksar skeletons in the Curator's Guard before starting the timer at the eastern rune foundation.

Icon.Name: ID68992
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68992 90.90,-38.95,-268.07 - Upon defeating the rune keeper this southwestern rune can be activated to start the timed quest 'Rune Run'. - For this you have 8 minutes to do the following: - Activate the eastern and southeastern runes, noting down the color of each activated rune. - Activating those 3 runes will summon the curator and keeper of the western rune Izzak Sira in the Curator's Guard. - Once Izzak becomes immune to damage, move to the foundation whose rune matches the color of the speed-buff pads that spawn. - Those pads also protect from the damage received when leaving them. - Near the correct rune Izzaks power will temporarily wane allowing him to be damaged, until he spawns a new set of speed-buff pads to follow. - Upon defeating Izzak activate the western rune to stop the timer and complete the quest. - It is ADVISED to clear out all 3 rune keepers and other DiZok ghosts as well as the exhumed iksar skeletons in the Curator's Guard before starting the timer at the eastern rune foundation.

Icon.Name: ID68993
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68993 259.29,-38.73,-336.92 Level 100 iksar skeleton. - Grouped with 2 level 100v an exhumed legionary. - It is ADVISED to clear out all iksar skeletons in the Curator's Guard before starting the timed quest 'Rune Run' by clicking on a rune foundation.

Icon.Name: ID68994
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68994 260.75,-38.73,-392.95 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID68995
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68995 275.68,-38.73,-266.26 - These pads give a speed buff and protect from the damage received when leaving them. - Use them to run to the rune foundation whose rune color matches the color of these pads on the floor.

Icon.Name: ID68996
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68996 -0.03,-13.81,-516.12 Unlocks upon defeating Izzak Sira.

Icon.Name: ID68997
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68997 9.51,-27.70,-484.37 - The color of the rune activated from the southeastern rune foundation is displayed here. - Note the color order of all 4 runes to solve the rune puzzle in the Triad.

Icon.Name: ID68998
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68998 -9.29,-27.70,-484.37 - The color of the rune activated from the southwestern rune foundation is displayed here. - Note the color order of all 4 runes to solve the rune puzzle in the Triad.

Icon.Name: ID68999
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68999 -17.88,-27.70,-484.40 - The color of the rune activated from the western rune foundation is displayed here. - Note the color order of all 4 runes to solve the rune puzzle in the Triad.

Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69000 182.93,-33.63,-422.67 It is ADVISED to destroy all 4 cracked walls and pull the group of spiders in each alcove out, before starting the timed quest 'Rest in Pieces' by entering any of the alcoves.

Icon.Name: ID69004
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69004 177.01,-38.75,-444.25 Level 100 iksar mummy. - Part of 1 of 4 ring events for the quest 'Rest in Pieces' that needs to be finished in 4 minutes. - 1st wave: a released mummified noble (a level 100 iksar mummy). - 2nd wave: a released skeletal noble (a level 100 iksar skeleton). - 3rd wave: a released spectral noble (a level 100 iksar ghost).

Icon.Name: ID69005
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69005 209.78,-38.74,-443.12 Level 100 iksar mummy. - Part of 1 of 4 ring events for the quest 'Rest in Pieces' that needs to be finished in 4 minutes. - 1st wave: a released mummified noble (a level 100 iksar mummy). - 2nd wave: a released skeletal noble (a level 100 iksar skeleton). - 3rd wave: a released spectral noble (a level 100 iksar ghost).

Icon.Name: ID69006
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69006 308.23,-38.74,-353.31 Level 100 iksar mummy. - Part of 1 of 4 ring events for the quest 'Rest in Pieces' that needs to be finished in 4 minutes. - 1st wave: a released mummified noble (a level 100 iksar mummy). - 2nd wave: a released skeletal noble (a level 100 iksar skeleton). - 3rd wave: a released spectral noble (a level 100 iksar ghost).

Icon.Name: ID69007

Icon.Name: ID69008
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69008 211.46,-38.73,-449.26 Level 100 spider. - Grouped with 2 crypt stalkers (level 100v spiders). - It is ADVISED to pull the spider groups in each alcove from outside the alcoves before starting the timed quest 'Rest in Pieces' by entering any of the alcoves.

Icon.Name: ID69009
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69009 310.68,-37.09,-316.15 Once you have defeated the ring event of the 3 released nobles close this lid to entomb 1 of 4 escaped undead iksars for the timed quest 'Rest in Pieces'.

Icon.Name: ID69010
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69010 311.25,-37.09,-348.05 Once you have defeated the ring event of the 3 released nobles close this lid to entomb 1 of 4 escaped undead iksars for the timed quest 'Rest in Pieces'.

Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69011 214.38,-37.09,-443.90 Once you have defeated the ring event of the 3 released nobles close this lid to entomb 1 of 4 escaped undead iksars for the timed quest 'Rest in Pieces'.

Icon.Name: ID69012
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69012 182.51,-37.09,-444.03 Once you have defeated the ring event of the 3 released nobles close this lid to entomb 1 of 4 escaped undead iksars for the timed quest 'Rest in Pieces'.

Icon.Name: ID69013
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69013 45.94,-13.99,-606.16 - Activate this southwestern rune in the order of the colors on the wall behind the altar of Rector Droz'Kzar in the Church of Kly. - Activating the rune in the correct order will open the nearby gate. - Activating all 3 Triad Access Runes in the correct order makes the Amalgams of the Triad attackable.

Icon.Name: ID69014

Icon.Name: ID69015
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69015 -48.86,-13.99,-604.52 - Activate this southeastern rune in the order of the colors on the wall behind the altar of Rector Droz'Kzar in the Church of Kly. - Activating the rune in the correct order will open the nearby gate. - Activating all 3 Triad Access Runes in the correct order makes the Amalgams of the Triad attackable.

Icon.Name: ID69019
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69019 -123.47,-13.99,-564.93 Level 101v golem. - The order on which of the 3 Amalgams (* = Arcane, Polar or Toxic) is in which room is random. - Becomes attackable upon activating all 3 Trial Access Runes in the correct ordrer. - Calls the other 2 Amalgams at 70% health for help. - Defeat the one you can defeat fastest first to avoid copying with the damage of all 3. This depends on class, but generally the one which corresponds to your damage type (i.e. polar for a wizard with elemental spells) is the slowest to defeat and should be done last.

Icon.Name: ID69020
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69020 120.79,-13.99,-565.95 Level 101v golem. - The order on which of the 3 Amalgams (* = Arcane, Polar or Toxic) is in which room is random. - Becomes attackable upon activating all 3 Trial Access Runes in the correct ordrer. - Calls the other 2 Amalgams at 70% health for help. - Defeat the one you can defeat fastest first to avoid copying with the damage of all 3. This depends on class, but generally the one which corresponds to your damage type (i.e. polar for a wizard with elemental spells) is the slowest to defeat and should be done last.

Icon.Name: ID69023
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69023 0.00,-13.79,-633.31 Connects to the lower purple teleportation pad by the Ritual Chamber.

Icon.Name: ID65364
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65364 0.00,-163.81,-483.98 Level 101^ Di'Zok. - Every 20% he will teleport himself onto his transfusion table to regain his health in a transfusion ritual. - To interrupt this you have to match the color of the previously inactive power source in either the southeastern or southwestern rooms to the corrispondingly colored activated orb of power in the corresponding east/west room to the north and press the switch to deactivate the power supply to the transfusion table.

Icon.Name: ID65365
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65365 -31.43,-163.63,-598.67 Connects to the southern orange teleportation pad to take you back up to the Entrance.

Icon.Name: ID69022
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69022 0.00,-176.53,-275.00 Connects to the upper purple teleportation pad in the Triad.

Icon.Name: ID69024
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69024 -0.21,-176.43,-418.43 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID69025
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69025 0.00,-176.72,-386.33 Level 100 Di'Zok ghost. - Spawns upon entering the Ritual Chamber. - Triggers Challenge Mode on the Kly if you defeat him fast enough. - Upon defeat the last locked door will open to let The Kly in.

Icon.Name: ID69026
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69026 -112.79,-169.62,-328.83 - While not in use this is named an inactive power source. - While the Kly is receiving his blood transfusion, note the color of the orb in this transfusion power source and press the corresponding switch in the northeastern control room.

Icon.Name: ID69027
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69027 112.36,-169.65,-328.73 - While not in use this is named an inactive power source. - While the Kly is receiving his blood transfusion, note the color of the orb in this transfusion power source and press the corresponding switch in the northwestern control room.

Icon.Name: ID69028
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69028 -0.22,-163.56,-505.93 Opens upon defeating a Kly overseer.

Icon.Name: ID69029
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69029 -68.77,-162.18,-528.58 Pressing the switch disconnects this activated green orb of power from the transfusion power source in the southeastern room.

Icon.Name: ID69030
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69030 -68.81,-162.18,-542.38 Pressing the switch disconnects this activated orange orb of power from the transfusion power source in the southeastern room.

Icon.Name: ID69031
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69031 -54.51,-162.18,-542.30 Pressing the switch disconnects this activated purple orb of power from the transfusion power source in the southeastern room.

Icon.Name: ID69032

Icon.Name: ID69033

Icon.Name: ID69034
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69034 67.87,-162.18,-529.32 Pressing the switch disconnects this activated blue orb of power from the transfusion power source in the southwestern room.

Icon.Name: ID69035
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69035 -0.12,-169.80,-440.22 The Kly will teleport here every 20% to receive a ritual transfusion which restores him to full health, unless its power delivery is interrupted.

Icon.Name: ID65386
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65386 640.78,-58.05,133.47 An ancient iksar ceremonial wand for Find Your Way Home - Scout Epic 2.0

Icon.Name: ID65197
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65197 637.98,-46.08,220.37 Activates upon defeating the Gooblin King and connects to the eastern purple teleportation pad by the zone entrance.

Icon.Name: ID65198
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65198 619.90,-57.45,109.20 Level 107^ goo goblin. - Needed for 'Slime Time [Advanced Solo]'. - Gets mutated from a regular goblin, when you get near the Kly assistant in the Mutation Hall. - Unlocks the western purple teleportation pad upon defeat. - Fight him outside the acidic vat.

Icon.Name: ID65199
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65199 629.95,-41.12,-142.19 Level 106 goo goblin. - Grouped with 2 gooblins (level 106v goo goblins). - These hit hard, it is not recommended to pull several groups at once and using your [Soothsayer's Bomb Dispenser] can help keeping one seperate from the others. - There are 4 additional groups of them in the Mutation Room ahead.

Icon.Name: ID65200
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65200 269.69,-45.60,-30.73 Level 107^ brute. - Runs here from the waterfall after all cavern dwellers have been defeated. - To avoid his knockback it is advised to fights him in the water by the waterfall. - Avoid the rock damage by jousting out of the yellow circle on the ground.

Icon.Name: ID65201
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65201 220.16,-44.51,-33.32 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID69046
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69046 441.46,-44.21,-131.26 Discovery location. - This is also the cage room Chorch spoke of for 'Ghost and Gooblins'.

Icon.Name: ID65202
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65202 208.67,-38.73,-244.07 Level 107^ iksar skeleton. - Paths from here to the northwestern crypt of Nazkra's Awakening and back. - The exhumed iksar skeletons of Nazkar's Legion will despawn upon defeating him. - Spawns a Kly assistant upon defeat. - It is ADVISED to pull him out of Nazkra's Awakening into one of the 2 hallways leading to the south to reduce the number of exhumed centurions and exhumed vicars, which respawn very quickly and he'll lock the doors upon engaging him.

Icon.Name: ID65203
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65203 220.89,-28.30,-94.14 Connects to the upper yellow teleportation pad to take you back up to the entrance.

Icon.Name: ID65204
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65204 7.99,26.50,-4.51 Takes you back to "Obulus Frontier".
Icon.Tooltip: Climb out of The Crypt of Dalnir

Icon.Name: ID69051
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69051 84.59,26.48,-91.83 Level 106 spider. - Grouped with 2 crypt stalkers (level 106v spiders). - Once the group has been cleared the coffin lid can be opened.

Icon.Name: ID65328
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65328 503.37,-36.17,-125.35 Level 106 Di'Zok ghost. - Spawns upon defeating Nazkra. - Save Shanks from this Kly assistant, so that he can give you the key to the door.

Icon.Name: ID69053
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69053 535.88,-35.85,-127.60 - Once you saved him from the Kly assistant you can talk with him. - He'll open the locked door behind him. - He'll also hand out [Soothsayer's Bomb Dispenser].

Icon.Name: ID65427
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65427 78.30,31.59,-72.15 You'll discover a place for Wreek to hide once you enter this alcove for 'Ghosts and Gooblins'.

Icon.Name: ID65428
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65428 341.27,-38.73,-217.28 - He is the source of the goblin scream. - After defeating the Obulus remnant talk to him to find him a good hiding spot for 'Ghosts and Gooblins'. - After finding the alcove for him to hide in return to him to tell him about it.

Icon.Name: ID69036
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69036 5.07,28.40,-45.23 - Needs help to turn the statue to rescue his clan members, but he is too weak to do it alone. - After helping him, he'll cast a buff called "Run Amok", which increases in-combat movement speed and prevents you from being interrupted.

Icon.Name: ID69037
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69037 5.67,28.40,-48.87 Rotate this western statue to be granted passage through the first locked door to the west.

Icon.Name: ID69038
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69038 31.25,26.67,-50.50 Rotate the western statue of the Haggle Baron's Warden to be granted passage.

Icon.Name: ID69039
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69039 248.43,-44.83,-4.53 Connects to the upper green teleportation pad to take you back up to the entrance.

Icon.Name: ID69040
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69040 144.95,26.68,-50.00 Connects to the lower green teleportation pad to take you down into the Deep Cavern.

Icon.Name: ID69041
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69041 128.45,25.82,-61.35 Connects to the lower yellow teleportation pad to take you down into the Deep Cavern.

Icon.Name: ID69042
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69042 122.44,24.35,-69.50 Activates upon defeating the Gooblin King and connects to the western purple teleportation pad in the Kly's Laboratory.

Icon.Name: ID69043
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69043 232.27,-45.11,-26.64 Level 106 brute. - Grouped with 2 cavern dwellers (level 106v brutes). - Upon defeating the pathing cavern dweller and all 4 groups of dwellers The Rock Collector will spawn.

Icon.Name: ID69044
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69044 282.16,-46.66,-25.61 Level 106 brute. - Paths from here in a clockwise circle around the Cavern to a spot nearby and then back to here in a counterclockwise fashion. - Upon defeating this and all 4 groups of cavern dwellers The Rock Collector will spawn.

Icon.Name: ID69045
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69045 265.78,-45.36,-34.81 Investigating this spot for signs of Ghawg will reveal fresh goblin scratches for 'Ghosts and Gooblins'.

Icon.Name: ID69047
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69047 209.70,-38.73,-253.75 Level 107v iksar skeleton. - Example for any of the 40 exhumed centurions and exhumed vicars standing throughout Nazkra's Awakening. - As they respawn very quickly, it is ADVISED to pull Nazkra out of Nazkra's Awakening into one of the 2 hallways leading to the south to avoid them as much as possible. - Will despawn upon defeating Nazkra.

Icon.Name: ID69048
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69048 407.19,-46.00,-16.34 Search ~4 cages for Ghawg by clicking on cage doors like this one for 'Ghost and Gooblins'.

Icon.Name: ID69049
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69049 343.87,-38.73,-216.69 Level 108 Di'zok ghost. - Needed to safe Wreek for 'Ghosts and Gooblins'. - Spawns after you hear a piercing goblin scream upon inspecting the cages in the Chasm of the Awaiting.

Icon.Name: ID69050
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69050 37.15,28.87,-92.77 Possible location for an obulus vase, one of which can contain a shiny.

Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69052 276.00,-38.73,-269.95 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID69054
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69054 538.48,-35.79,-128.37 Shanks will unlock this door for you after you have saved him from the Kly assistant.

Icon.Name: ID69055
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69055 581.51,-58.13,128.79 Level 106? goo goblin. - While searching the Mutation Hall for Ghawg a single roaming gooblin drops [Ghawg's chokidai teeth necklace] for 'Ghost and Gooblins'. - This confirms your fear that Ghawg has already been transformed into a gooblin and now you want to make sure that at least Wreek is safe.

Icon.Name: ID69056

Icon.Name: ID69285
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69285 14.34,-18.50,126.92 Scaling level 0^^^ devourer. - Needed for the mission 'The Chamber's Secrets'. - Teleports you to the center of the room - Applies DoT, that causes massive damage if you're near other players. - Spawns devourling adds (level -2vvv- -1vvv devourers).
Icon.Tooltip: Bi'lithu of the Old Ways <The Crypt Feaster>

Icon.Name: ID69286
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69286 14.16,-18.25,141.63 The whole platform in front of Bi'lithu is a pit trap with devourers waiting for careless adventurers.

Icon.Name: ID69287
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69287 -83.27,-17.62,96.94 Scaling level 0^^^ golem. - Needed for the mission 'The Chamber's Secrets'. - Upon defeat the prison obelisk behind it will unlock. - Has a knockback.

Icon.Name: ID69288
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69288 -93.53,-17.62,180.31 Scaling level 0^^^ golem. - Needed for the mission 'The Chamber's Secrets'. - Upon defeat the lift lever in front of it will unlock.
Icon.Tooltip: Gear of the Ancients <The Gear Windlass>

Icon.Name: ID69289
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69289 154.33,-18.37,64.36 Scaling level 0^^^ skorpskis. - Drops [The Forbidden Pages - Page 5] for the collection 'The Forbidden Pages' needed for the Monk Epic quest 'The Broken Hand'. - While he also drops [the tail of Impaler Tzilug] for the quest 'Anaphylaxis' he does not give the required update for defeating him forcing you to do this in the regular non-agnostic version of the zone.

Icon.Name: ID69290
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69290 14.45,-17.37,296.06 Scaling level 0^^^ iksar skeleton. - Needed for the mission 'The Chamber's Secrets'. - Grouped with 2 more Handmaiden's Thera'ta and Xe'ziza of the Jarsath (level 0^^^ iksar skeletons). - It is recommended to defeat them in the order Thera'ta, Derzitha and then Xe'ziza.

Icon.Name: ID69291
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69291 13.99,5.13,187.45 Scaling level 0^^^ iksar skeleton. - Needed for the mission 'The Chamber's Secrets'. - Drops [The Forbidden Pages - Page 7] for the collection 'The Forbidden Pages' needed for the Monk Epic quest 'The Broken Hand' and [Vazaelle's upper spine] for the Necromancer Epic quest 'The Bones of Insanity'. - After she is defeated and you have assembled your Top, Bottom and [Middle Shard of an Obulus Medallion] to the [Restored Obulus Medallion] you can gather Drusella's Bones from the floor for the KA SQ 'Kunark Ascending: Resurrection Machination'.
Icon.Tooltip: Drusella Sathir <Empress of the Sathirian Empire>

Icon.Name: ID69400

Icon.Name: ID69401
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69401 6.38,314.34,121.18 - Empowered by the chaos stones Lanys performs an apotheosis on her pledge Setri, which turns her into Terris-Thule <Goddess of Nightmares> (level 108^^^ x4 deity). - You have to confront her but are not able to defeat her and instead have to report the events back to your Queen for the KA SQ 'Kunark Ascending: A Nightmare Realized'. - A short while into the fight Saryrn will join her and render your weapons useless. - Spawned by defeating a Kaniz ravager and a Nightmarish acolyte.

Icon.Name: ID69402
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69402 -17.09,310.11,34.77 The possession of all chaos stones empowers Lanys, which comes to his attention wishing to put an end to it, but he is instead turned into a shell of himself and banished to Nektulos Forest by her.

Icon.Name: ID69403
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69403 -1.42,329.73,146.34 - The possession of all chaos stones empowers Lanys, which comes to Innoruuk's attention wishing to put an end to it, but he is instead turned into a shell of himself and banished to Nektulos Forest by her. - She then proceeds to perform an apotheosis on her pledge Setri, which turns her into Terris-Thule <Goddess of Nightmares> (level 108^^^ x4 deity). - Spawned by defeating a Kaniz ravager and a Nightmarish acolyte.

Icon.PoiDescription: ID:35233 -81.61,-8.09,216.83 Level 83^^^x4 iksar skeleton. - Grouped with an Askalan Hierophant and an Askalan Seer (level 83^^^ iksar skeletons) - Drops [Zykluk's Fragment] for Meldrath. - Becomes aggro when the player holding the [Ancient Sebilisian Shards] gets near hiim. - Has an ability called Judgement of the Faceless that fears and does noxious damage over time.

Icon.Name: ID35234
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:35234 39.92,-8.09,216.47 Level 83^^^x4 iksar skeleton. - Grouped with an Askalan Hierophant and an Askalan Seer (level 83^^^ iksar skeletons) - Drops [Wymbulu's Fragment] for Meldrath. - Becomes aggro when the player holding the [Ancient Sebilisian Shards] gets near hiim. - Has a knockback.

Icon.Name: ID35811
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:35811 -31.42,-13.03,360.96 Level 83^^^x4 half elf. - Grouped with Blorgok the Brutal (level 83^^^ ogre), Jracol Binari (level 83^^^ human), Meldrath Kloktik (level 83^^^ gnome) and 2 froglok mercenaries (level 83^^^ frogloks). - Drops the [Sebilisian Staff of Sounding] needed for the last fight. - Meldrath will spawn Doomcoil as an add if you failed to defeat it on the first pull.

Icon.Name: ID35812
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:35812 14.23,-10.09,291.24 Level 84^^^x4 clockwork snake. - If not defeated on the first pull it can't be triggered again and will instead add to a later fight if not prevented. - Has a knockback called Sonic Burst.

Icon.Name: ID69851
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69851 -32.01,-6.30,153.36 Leads back out to "Sebilis".

Icon.Name: ID69852
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69852 -32.36,-10.30,369.81 This barrier can be broken with your [Sebilisian Staff of Sounding].

Icon.Name: ID69853
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69853 23.68,-10.09,295.24 - After you overhear a discussion of a failed fight, she'll offer you a deal that you can accept by right-clicking her. - After resurrecting Jracol she'll propose that they rest here a bit while you gather the shards from the 4 iksar skeletons in the previous area for which you'll need the shards that Meldrath offers you.

Icon.Name: ID69854
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69854 23.99,-10.09,292.29 - To learn more about the deal Ludmila proposes you have to resurrect (right-click) this fallen priest. - You might need to be a priest to perform this step.

Icon.Name: ID69855
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69855 12.75,-10.09,298.28 - Offers you to take the [Ancient Sebilisian Shards] (right-click) from him to be able to activate the iksar skeletons in the previous area. - After defeating the 4 Vyx Warchiefs one player that holds all 4 fragments should give these warchief remains to him (right-click). - After giving him the shards they will leave the room and seal it with a magical barrier. He will then activate Doomcoil.

Icon.Name: ID69856
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69856 -33.00,-10.00,411.00 Level 84^^^x4 golem. - Drops [The Greenmist Orb] for the quest 'The Fate of Norrath' that is also needed in the fight against the Leviathan. - Once he reaches 35% HP he will become immune to damage until the pillars have been defeated with the [Sebilisian Staff of Sounding].
